trans-unit.source: Represents a light source that has a specified position in space and projects its light in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 表示在空间中具有指定位置并向所有方向上投射光线的光源。

trans-unit.source: The rate at which the light's intensity diminishes over distance is called its attenuation and can be controlled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 显示光亮度随距离的速率称为其衰减，可以通过设置控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.ConstantAttenuation%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.LinearAttenuation%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase.QuadraticAttenuation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following examples create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight> object and set some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>对象，并将其一些属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> class at the origin.
trans-unit.target: 初始化位于原点的、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> class at the origin.
trans-unit.target: 初始化位于原点的、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The diffuse color.
trans-unit.target: 漫射色。

trans-unit.source: The position.
trans-unit.target: 位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> class at the specified position, using the specified color.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定颜色初始化位于指定位置的、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
